invention-title: New energy hydrogen cylinder transportation fixing device and method
一种新能源氢气瓶运输固定装置及方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a new energy hydrogen cylinder transporting and fixing device in the technical field of hydrogen energy, which comprises a placing table, a plurality of supporting grooves are formed in the placing table, placing plates and supporting assemblies are arranged at the supporting grooves, the bottoms of the supporting assemblies are connected with adjusting assemblies, and the two sides of the placing table are connected with a first limiting plate and a second limiting plate through moving assemblies. A plurality of circular grooves are formed in the first limiting plate, and the positions of the supporting assembly and the placing plates are adjusted through the adjusting assembly, so that hydrogen cylinders are limited through the two symmetrically-inclined placing plates; the first limiting plate and the second limiting plate are moved through the moving assembly, the two ends of the hydrogen cylinder are limited, and the structure of the gas inlet end of the hydrogen cylinder is located in the circular groove; and after the first limiting plate and the second limiting plate move and are limited, the width of the whole fixing device is close to the distance between the first limiting plate and the second limiting plate, so that the overall size of the fixing device is reduced, and the device is more convenient to move or convey.

本发明公开了氢能源技术领域的一种新能源氢气瓶运输固定装置，包括放置台，放置台上设有多个支撑槽，支撑槽处设有放置板和支撑组件，多个支撑组件底部连接有调节组件，放置台的两侧通过移动组件连接有第一限位板和第二限位板，第一限位板上设有多个圆形槽，本发明通过调节组件调整支撑组件和放置板的位置，以便通过对称倾斜的两个放置板对氢气瓶进行限位；通过移动组件使第一限位板和第二限位板移动，对氢气瓶两端进行限位，且氢气瓶进气端的结构位于圆形槽中；在第一限位板和第二限位板移动并进行限位后，整个固定装置的宽度接近于第一限位板和第二限位板的距离，从而减小固定装置的整体大小，使装置更加便于移动或输送。
